column4: i hate brasero. i get burn errors all the time trying to burn iso's
i had problems burning an xbox 360 iso using k3b also. it tried to burn to a dual layer dvd+r disc. it appeared to work but won't play in my modded xbox 360. weird!
ubuntuone will NOT allow me to add this computer to it. it's running 10.04 and it does NOT open a webpage to add this computer. Any thoughts?
